alif-lam-meem-ra til'ka āyātu al-kitābi wa-alladhī unzila ilayka min rabbika al-ḥaqu walākinna akthara al-nāsi lā yu'minūna

al-lahu alladhī rafaʿa al-samāwāti bighayri ʿamadin tarawnahā thumma is'tawā ʿalā al-ʿarshi wasakhara al-shamsa wal-qamara kullun yajrī li-ajalin musamman yudabbiru al-amra yufaṣṣilu al-āyāti laʿallakum biliqāi rabbikum tūqinūna
wahuwa alladhī madda al-arḍa wajaʿala fīhā rawāsiya wa-anhāran wamin kulli al-thamarāti jaʿala fīhā zawjayni ith'nayni yugh'shī al-layla al-nahāra inna fī dhālika laāyātin liqawmin yatafakkarūna

wafī al-arḍi qiṭaʿun mutajāwirātun wajannātun min aʿnābin wazarʿun wanakhīlun ṣin'wānun waghayru ṣin'wānin yus'qā bimāin wāḥidin wanufaḍḍilu baʿḍahā ʿalā baʿḍin fī al-ukuli inna fī dhālika laāyātin liqawmin yaʿqilūna
wa-in taʿjab faʿajabun qawluhum a-idhā kunnā turāban a-innā lafī khalqin jadīdin ulāika alladhīna kafarū birabbihim wa-ulāika al-aghlālu fī aʿnāqihim wa-ulāika aṣḥābu al-nāri hum fīhā khālidūna
wayastaʿjilūnaka bil-sayi-ati qabla al-ḥasanati waqad khalat min qablihimu al-mathulātu wa-inna rabbaka ladhū maghfiratin lilnnāsi ʿalā ẓul'mihim wa-inna rabbaka lashadīdu al-ʿiqābi
wayaqūlu alladhīna kafarū lawlā unzila ʿalayhi āyatun min rabbihi innamā anta mundhirun walikulli qawmin hādin
al-lahu yaʿlamu mā taḥmilu kullu unthā wamā taghīḍu al-arḥāmu wamā tazdādu wakullu shayin ʿindahu bimiq'dārin
ʿālimu al-ghaybi wal-shahādati al-kabīru al-mutaʿāli
sawāon minkum man asarra al-qawla waman jahara bihi waman huwa mus'takhfin bi-al-layli wasāribun bil-nahāri

lahu muʿaqqibātun min bayni yadayhi wamin khalfihi yaḥfaẓūnahu min amri al-lahi inna al-laha lā yughayyiru mā biqawmin ḥattā yughayyirū mā bi-anfusihim wa-idhā arāda al-lahu biqawmin sūan falā maradda lahu wamā lahum min dūnihi min wālin
huwa alladhī yurīkumu al-barqa khawfan waṭamaʿan wayunshi-u al-saḥāba al-thiqāla
wayusabbiḥu al-raʿdu biḥamdihi wal-malāikatu min khīfatihi wayur'silu al-ṣawāʿiqa fayuṣību bihā man yashāu wahum yujādilūna fī al-lahi wahuwa shadīdu al-miḥāli
lahu daʿwatu al-ḥaqi wa-alladhīna yadʿūna min dūnihi lā yastajībūna lahum bishayin illā kabāsiṭi kaffayhi ilā al-māi liyablugha fāhu wamā huwa bibālighihi wamā duʿāu al-kāfirīna illā fī ḍalālin
walillahi yasjudu man fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi ṭawʿan wakarhan waẓilāluhum bil-ghuduwi wal-āṣāli

qul man rabbu al-samāwāti wal-arḍi quli al-lahu qul afa-ittakhadhtum min dūnihi awliyāa lā yamlikūna li-anfusihim nafʿan walā ḍarran qul hal yastawī al-aʿmā wal-baṣīru am hal tastawī al-ẓulumātu wal-nūru am jaʿalū lillahi shurakāa khalaqū kakhalqihi fatashābaha al-khalqu ʿalayhim quli al-lahu khāliqu kulli shayin wahuwa al-wāḥidu al-qahāru

anzala mina al-samāi māan fasālat awdiyatun biqadarihā fa-iḥ'tamala al-saylu zabadan rābiyan wamimmā yūqidūna ʿalayhi fī al-nāri ib'tighāa ḥil'yatin aw matāʿin zabadun mith'luhu kadhālika yaḍribu al-lahu al-ḥaqa wal-bāṭila fa-ammā al-zabadu fayadhhabu jufāan wa-ammā mā yanfaʿu al-nāsa fayamkuthu fī al-arḍi kadhālika yaḍribu al-lahu al-amthāla

lilladhīna is'tajābū lirabbihimu al-ḥus'nā wa-alladhīna lam yastajībū lahu law anna lahum mā fī al-arḍi jamīʿan wamith'lahu maʿahu la-if'tadaw bihi ulāika lahum sūu al-ḥisābi wamawāhum jahannamu wabi'sa al-mihādu
afaman yaʿlamu annamā unzila ilayka min rabbika al-ḥaqu kaman huwa aʿmā innamā yatadhakkaru ulū al-albābi
alladhīna yūfūna biʿahdi al-lahi walā yanquḍūna al-mīthāqa
wa-alladhīna yaṣilūna mā amara al-lahu bihi an yūṣala wayakhshawna rabbahum wayakhāfūna sūa al-ḥisābi
wa-alladhīna ṣabarū ib'tighāa wajhi rabbihim wa-aqāmū al-ṣalata wa-anfaqū mimmā razaqnāhum sirran waʿalāniyatan wayadraūna bil-ḥasanati al-sayi-ata ulāika lahum ʿuq'bā al-dāri
jannātu ʿadnin yadkhulūnahā waman ṣalaḥa min ābāihim wa-azwājihim wadhurriyyātihim wal-malāikatu yadkhulūna ʿalayhim min kulli bābin
salāmun ʿalaykum bimā ṣabartum faniʿ'ma ʿuq'bā al-dāri
wa-alladhīna yanquḍūna ʿahda al-lahi min baʿdi mīthāqihi wayaqṭaʿūna mā amara al-lahu bihi an yūṣala wayuf'sidūna fī al-arḍi ulāika lahumu al-laʿnatu walahum sūu al-dāri
al-lahu yabsuṭu al-riz'qa liman yashāu wayaqdiru wafariḥū bil-ḥayati al-dun'yā wamā al-ḥayatu al-dun'yā fī al-ākhirati illā matāʿun
wayaqūlu alladhīna kafarū lawlā unzila ʿalayhi āyatun min rabbihi qul inna al-laha yuḍillu man yashāu wayahdī ilayhi man anāba
alladhīna āmanū wataṭma-innu qulūbuhum bidhik'ri al-lahi alā bidhik'ri al-lahi taṭma-innu al-qulūbu
alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti ṭūbā lahum waḥus'nu maābin

kadhālika arsalnāka fī ummatin qad khalat min qablihā umamun litatluwā ʿalayhimu alladhī awḥaynā ilayka wahum yakfurūna bil-raḥmāni qul huwa rabbī lā ilāha illā huwa ʿalayhi tawakkaltu wa-ilayhi matābi

walaw anna qur'ānan suyyirat bihi al-jibālu aw quṭṭiʿat bihi al-arḍu aw kullima bihi al-mawtā bal lillahi al-amru jamīʿan afalam yāy'asi alladhīna āmanū an law yashāu al-lahu lahadā al-nāsa jamīʿan walā yazālu alladhīna kafarū tuṣībuhum bimā ṣanaʿū qāriʿatun aw taḥullu qarīban min dārihim ḥattā yatiya waʿdu al-lahi inna al-laha lā yukh'lifu al-mīʿāda
walaqadi us'tuh'zi-a birusulin min qablika fa-amlaytu lilladhīna kafarū thumma akhadhtuhum fakayfa kāna ʿiqābi

afaman huwa qāimun ʿalā kulli nafsin bimā kasabat wajaʿalū lillahi shurakāa qul sammūhum am tunabbiūnahu bimā lā yaʿlamu fī al-arḍi am biẓāhirin mina al-qawli bal zuyyina lilladhīna kafarū makruhum waṣuddū ʿani al-sabīli waman yuḍ'lili al-lahu famā lahu min hādin
lahum ʿadhābun fī al-ḥayati al-dun'yā walaʿadhābu al-ākhirati ashaqqu wamā lahum mina al-lahi min wāqin
mathalu al-janati allatī wuʿida al-mutaqūna tajrī min taḥtihā al-anhāru ukuluhā dāimun waẓilluhā til'ka ʿuq'bā alladhīna ittaqaw waʿuq'bā al-kāfirīna al-nāru
wa-alladhīna ātaynāhumu al-kitāba yafraḥūna bimā unzila ilayka wamina al-aḥzābi man yunkiru baʿḍahu qul innamā umir'tu an aʿbuda al-laha walā ush'rika bihi ilayhi adʿū wa-ilayhi maābi
wakadhālika anzalnāhu ḥuk'man ʿarabiyyan wala-ini ittabaʿta ahwāahum baʿdamā jāaka mina al-ʿil'mi mā laka mina al-lahi min waliyyin walā wāqin
walaqad arsalnā rusulan min qablika wajaʿalnā lahum azwājan wadhurriyyatan wamā kāna lirasūlin an yatiya biāyatin illā bi-idh'ni al-lahi likulli ajalin kitābun
yamḥū al-lahu mā yashāu wayuth'bitu waʿindahu ummu al-kitābi
wa-in mā nuriyannaka baʿḍa alladhī naʿiduhum aw natawaffayannaka fa-innamā ʿalayka al-balāghu waʿalaynā al-ḥisābu
awalam yaraw annā natī al-arḍa nanquṣuhā min aṭrāfihā wal-lahu yaḥkumu lā muʿaqqiba liḥuk'mihi wahuwa sarīʿu al-ḥisābi
waqad makara alladhīna min qablihim falillahi al-makru jamīʿan yaʿlamu mā taksibu kullu nafsin wasayaʿlamu al-kufāru liman ʿuq'bā al-dāri
wayaqūlu alladhīna kafarū lasta mur'salan qul kafā bil-lahi shahīdan baynī wabaynakum waman ʿindahu ʿil'mu al-kitābi
